description:
For Halloween, Sora and the gang decorate Mashiro’s house like a witch’s house, and welcome children. Meanwhile, Cure Pumpkin appears in town, saying he’s a member of the Precures..
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Dai Majo Yoyo to Halloween Party!
Great Witch Yoyo and the Halloween Party!
大魔女ヨヨとハロウィンパーティー!
